statements: SELECT * FROM CropRotationData WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT crop_type, yield_data FROM CropRotationData WHERE year >= 2018 ORDER BY crop_type ASC;
SELECT crop_type, MAX(yield_data) AS max_yield FROM CropRotationData GROUP BY crop_type HAVING max_yield > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT year FROM CropRotationData WHERE yield_data < 30 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT AVG(yield_data) AS avg_yield, MIN(yield_data) AS min_yield FROM CropRotationData WHERE crop_type = 'Corn';
SELECT * FROM CropRotationData WHERE crop_type = 'Wheat' ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT year, SUM(yield_data) AS total_yield FROM CropRotationData WHERE year >= 2000 GROUP BY year;
SELECT crop_type, AVG(yield_data) AS avg_yield FROM CropRotationData WHERE year = 2021 AND crop_type IN ('Corn', 'Soybean') GROUP BY crop_type;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_type FROM CropRotationData WHERE yield_data > 50 ORDER BY crop_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM CropRotationData WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 AND crop_type != 'Barley' ORDER BY year ASC, yield_data DESC;
SELECT * FROM YearlyYieldData WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT crop_type, year, yield FROM YearlyYieldData WHERE crop_type = 'Corn';
SELECT DISTINCT crop_type FROM CropRotationPractices;
SELECT practice_id, crop_type, rotation_years FROM CropRotationPractices WHERE rotation_years > 3;
SELECT year, crop_type, MAX(yield) AS max_yield FROM YearlyYieldData GROUP BY year, crop_type;
SELECT * FROM YearlyYieldData WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_type FROM YearlyYieldData;
SELECT crop_type, SUM(yield) AS total_yield FROM YearlyYieldData GROUP BY crop_type;
SELECT * FROM CropRotationPractices WHERE rotation_years > 5 ORDER BY practice_id DESC;
SELECT year, crop_type, yield FROM YearlyYieldData WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' AND year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT crop_type, yield_amount FROM crop_yield_data WHERE crop_type = 'Wheat';
SELECT year, crop_type, rotation_order FROM crop_rotation WHERE year > 2018 ORDER BY year DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_history WHERE previous_crop = 'Corn' AND current_crop = 'Soybean';
SELECT MAX(yield_amount) AS max_yield FROM crop_yield_data;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY yield_amount DESC
SELECT crop_type, AVG(yield_amount) AS avg_yield FROM crop_yield_data GROUP BY crop_type HAVING AVG(yield_amount) > 100
SELECT DISTINCT crop_type FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_amount < 50
SELECT year, SUM(yield_amount) AS total_yield FROM crop_yield_data GROUP BY year ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT c.year, c.crop_type, c.rotation_order, r.previous_crop FROM crop_rotation c JOIN crop_rotation_history r ON c.year = r.year ORDER BY c.rotation_order ASC
SELECT * FROM farmers;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM crops;
SELECT farmer_name, farmer_location FROM farmers WHERE farmer_location = 'California';
SELECT yield_amount, yield_year FROM yields WHERE yield_year > 2018 ORDER BY yield_amount DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, crop_name, yield_amount FROM farmers JOIN yields ON farmers.farmer_id = yields.farmer_id JOIN crops ON crops.crop_id = yields.crop_id;
SELECT * FROM farmers;
SELECT farmer_name, farmer_location FROM farmers WHERE farmer_location='California';
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM crops WHERE crop_type='Fruit' ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, yield_amount FROM farmers JOIN yields ON farmers.farmer_id=yields.farmer_id WHERE yield_year=2021;

SELECT farmers.farmer_name, crops.crop_name, yields.yield_amount FROM farmers JOIN yields ON farmers.farmer_id=yields.farmer_id JOIN crops ON crops.crop_id=yields.crop_id WHERE farmers.farmer_location='Texas';
SELECT * FROM years_yield;
SELECT year, yield FROM crop_data WHERE crop_name = 'corn';
SELECT * FROM farm_operations ORDER BY operation_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, MAX(yield) FROM comparison_data GROUP BY crop_name;
SELECT crop_name, AVG(yield) FROM years_yield WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT * FROM years_yield ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT crop_name, rotation_cycle FROM crop_rotation WHERE rotation_cycle > 3;
SELECT * FROM farm_operations WHERE operation_type = 'harvest' AND operation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, yield FROM crop_data WHERE planting_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY yield DESC;
SELECT crop_name, year, MAX(yield) AS max_yield FROM comparison_data GROUP BY crop_name, year HAVING max(yield) > 100;
